channel.title: BUscience
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUscience, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Voyager missed it, but James Webb Just Found Uranus’ hidden moon
item.description: Astronomers using the James Webb Space Telescope have uncovered a tiny new moon orbiting Uranus, increasing the planet’s moon tally to 29. The object,...

item.title: The surprising reason timber plantations explode into megafires
item.description: Industrial forests, packed with evenly spaced trees, face nearly 50% higher odds of megafires than public lands. A lidar-powered study of California’s...

item.title: Ancient solar system crash may explain Bennu and Ryugu’s origin

item.title: Astronomers stunned by the strangest supernova ever seen

item.title: How hidden cosmic highways feed the Universe’s biggest stars
item.description: Massive stars have always puzzled scientists—how do they grow so quickly despite fierce radiation pushing material away? New high-resolution ALMA obse...
